transcript: him, hungry as he was, to look on at a dinner where there was no place for him. In the next hut there was a French colonel who had been taken prisoner by our dragoons. Our officers were flocking in to look at him. Prince Bagrati6n was thanking the individual commanders and inquiring into details of the action and our losses.
